pkgmetadata.longdescription: Imbalanced Resampling using SMOTE with Boosting // Provides Random Oversampling, Random Undersampling, Synthetic Oversampling Minority Technique and SMOTE with Boosting by Saglam and Cengiz (2022) doi:10.1016/j.eswa.2022.117023 for imbalanced data resampling. SMOTE with Boosting is a SMOTE- based oversampling method which can determine the number of links for each positive sample and robust to noise.
